import { initializeApp } from 'firebase/app';
import { getAuth, createUserWithEmailAndPassword, signInWithEmailAndPassword, signOut, onAuthStateChanged } from 'firebase/auth';
import { getFirestore, doc, setDoc, getDoc } from 'firebase/firestore';

const firebaseConfig = {
  apiKey: "AIzaSyAC5TVnmi7vXoM5p5zTMr3E14eiDW8-yfA",
  authDomain: "minevoca-4c6ac.firebaseapp.com",
  projectId: "minevoca-4c6ac",
  storageBucket: "minevoca-4c6ac.firebasestorage.app",
  messagingSenderId: "926961077989",
  appId: "1:926961077989:web:e4e9fa57bf17a70a2ace0c",
};

const app = initializeApp(firebaseConfig);
const auth = getAuth(app);
const db = getFirestore(app);

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { Volume2, Check, X, Plus, Trash2, Edit2, Book, Brain, GraduationCap } from 'lucide-react';

export default function MineVocaApp() {
  const [isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn] = useState(false);
  const [currentUser, setCurrentUser] = useState(null);
  const [authView, setAuthView] = useState('login');
  const [authError, setAuthError] = useState('');
  const [loginForm, setLoginForm] = useState({ email: '', password: '' });
  const [signupForm, setSignupForm] = useState({ email: '', name: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '' });
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);

  const [currentView, setCurrentView] = useState('books');
  const [selectedBook, setSelectedBook] = useState(null);
  const [books, setBooks] = useState([
    { id: 1, name: '기본 단어장', wordCount: 0 }
  ]);
  const [newBookName, setNewBookName] = useState('');
  const [showBookInput, setShowBookInput] = useState(false);
  
  const [words, setWords] = useState([]);
  const [newWord, setNewWord] = useState({ english: '', korean: '', example: '' });
  const [editingWord, setEditingWord] = useState(null);
  const [showAnswer, setShowAnswer] = useState(false);
  const [currentCardIndex, setCurrentCardIndex] = useState(0);
  const [quizAnswer, setQuizAnswer] = useState('');
  const [quizResult, setQuizResult] = useState(null);
  const [score, setScore] = useState({ correct: 0, total: 0 });

  // 로그인 처리
 const handleLogin = async () => {
  if (!loginForm.email || !loginForm.password) {
    setAuthError('이메일과 비밀번호를 입력해주세요');
    return;
  }
  if (loginForm.password.length !== 6) {
    setAuthError('비밀번호는 6자리 숫자여야 합니다');
    return;
  }
  
  try {
    await signInWithEmailAndPassword(auth, loginForm.email, loginForm.password);
    setAuthError('');
    setLoginForm({ email: '', password: '' });
  } catch (error) {
    if (error.code === 'auth/user-not-found') {
      setAuthError('존재하지 않는 계정입니다');
    } else if (error.code === 'auth/wrong-password') {
      setAuthError('비밀번호가 올바르지 않습니다');
    } else {
      setAuthError('로그인에 실패했습니다');
    }
  }
};


  // 회원가입 처리
  const handleSignup = async () => {
  if (!signupForm.email || !signupForm.name || !signupForm.password || !signupForm.confirmPassword) {
    setAuthError('모든 필드를 입력해주세요');
    return;
  }
  if (signupForm.password.length !== 6) {
    setAuthError('비밀번호는 6자리 숫자여야 합니다');
    return;
  }
  if (signupForm.password !== signupForm.confirmPassword) {
    setAuthError('비밀번호가 일치하지 않습니다');
    return;
  }
  
  try {
    const userCredential = await createUserWithEmailAndPassword(auth, signupForm.email, signupForm.password);
    
    await setDoc(doc(db, 'users', userCredential.user.uid), {
      name: signupForm.name,
      email: signupForm.email,
      createdAt: new Date()
    });

    await setDoc(doc(db, 'userData', userCredential.user.uid), {
      books: [{ id: 1, name: '기본 단어장', wordCount: 0 }],
      words: [],
      createdAt: new Date()
    });
    
    setAuthError('');
    setSignupForm({ email: '', name: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '' });
  } catch (error) {
    if (error.code === 'auth/email-already-in-use') {
      setAuthError('이미 사용 중인 이메일입니다');
    } else {
      setAuthError('회원가입에 실패했습니다');
    }
  }
};



  // 로그아웃
  const handleLogout = async () => {
  try {
    await signOut(auth);
    setCurrentView('books');
    setSelectedBook(null);
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('로그아웃 실패:', error);
  }
};


  // 사용자 데이터 로드
  const loadUserData = async (userId) => {
  try {
    const userDataDoc = await getDoc(doc(db, 'userData', userId));
    if (userDataDoc.exists()) {
      const data = userDataDoc.data();
      setBooks(data.books || [{ id: 1, name: '기본 단어장', wordCount: 0 }]);
      setWords(data.words || []);
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('데이터 로드 실패:', error);
  }
};


  // 사용자 데이터 저장
  const saveUserData = async () => {
  if (currentUser) {
    try {
      await setDoc(doc(db, 'userData', currentUser.uid), {
        books,
        words,
        lastUpdated: new Date()
      });
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('데이터 저장 실패:', error);
    }
  }
};


  // 데이터 저장 (변경 시마다)
useEffect(() => {
  const unsubscribe = onAuthStateChanged(auth, async (user) => {
    if (user) {
      setIsLoggedIn(true);
      const userDoc = await getDoc(doc(db, 'users', user.uid));
      if (userDoc.exists()) {
        setCurrentUser({ uid: user.uid, email: user.email, name: userDoc.data().name });
        await loadUserData(user.uid);
      }
    } else {
      setIsLoggedIn(false);
      setCurrentUser(null);
    }
    setLoading(false);
  });
  return () => unsubscribe();
}, []);
  
useEffect(() => {
  if (isLoggedIn && currentUser && !loading) {
    saveUserData();
  }
}, [books, words]);


  // 단어장 추가
  const addBook = () => {
    if (newBookName.trim()) {
      const newBook = {
        id: Date.now(),
        name: newBookName,
        wordCount: 0
      };
      setBooks([...books, newBook]);
      setNewBookName('');
      setShowBookInput(false);
    }
  };

  // 단어장 삭제
  const deleteBook = (bookId) => {
    if (window.confirm('이 단어장을 삭제하시겠습니까?')) {
      setBooks(books.filter(b => b.id !== bookId));
      setWords(words.filter(w => w.bookId !== bookId));
      if (selectedBook?.id === bookId) {
        setSelectedBook(null);
        setCurrentView('books');
      }
    }
  };

  // 단어장 선택
  const selectBook = (book) => {
    setSelectedBook(book);
    setCurrentView('list');
  };

  // 단어 추가
  const addWord = () => {
    if (newWord.english && newWord.korean) {
      const word = {
        id: Date.now(),
        bookId: selectedBook.id,
        english: newWord.english,
        korean: newWord.korean,
        example: newWord.example,
        mastered: false
      };
      setWords([...words, word]);
      setNewWord({ english: '', korean: '', example: '' });
      
      // 단어장의 단어 수 업데이트
      setBooks(books.map(b => 
        b.id === selectedBook.id 
          ? { ...b, wordCount: b.wordCount + 1 }
          : b
      ));
    }
  };

  // 단어 삭제
  const deleteWord = (wordId) => {
    if (window.confirm('이 단어를 삭제하시겠습니까?')) {
      setWords(words.filter(w => w.id !== wordId));
      setBooks(books.map(b => 
        b.id === selectedBook.id 
          ? { ...b, wordCount: Math.max(0, b.wordCount - 1) }
          : b
      ));
    }
  };

  // 단어 수정
  const updateWord = (wordId, updatedWord) => {
    setWords(words.map(w => w.id === wordId ? { ...w, ...updatedWord } : w));
    setEditingWord(null);
  };

  // 암기 완료 토글
  const toggleMastered = (wordId) => {
    setWords(words.map(w => 
      w.id === wordId ? { ...w, mastered: !w.mastered } : w
    ));
  };

  // 발음 듣기
  const speakWord = (text) => {
    const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance(text);
    utterance.lang = 'en-US';
    utterance.rate = 0.8;
    window.speechSynthesis.speak(utterance);
  };

  // 플래시카드 네비게이션
  const nextCard = () => {
    setShowAnswer(false);
    setCurrentCardIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % words.filter(w => w.bookId === selectedBook?.id).length);
  };

  const prevCard = () => {
    setShowAnswer(false);
    const bookWords = words.filter(w => w.bookId === selectedBook?.id);
    setCurrentCardIndex((prev) => (prev - 1 + bookWords.length) % bookWords.length);
  };

  // 퀴즈 정답 확인
  const checkAnswer = () => {
    const bookWords = words.filter(w => w.bookId === selectedBook?.id);
    const currentWord = bookWords[currentCardIndex];
    const isCorrect = quizAnswer.trim().toLowerCase() === currentWord.korean.toLowerCase();
    
    setQuizResult(isCorrect);
    setScore({
      correct: score.correct + (isCorrect ? 1 : 0),
      total: score.total + 1
    });
  };

  // 다음 퀴즈
  const nextQuiz = () => {
    setQuizAnswer('');
    setQuizResult(null);
    nextCard();
  };

  // 현재 단어장의 단어들만 필터링
  const currentBookWords = words.filter(w => w.bookId === selectedBook?.id);

if (loading) {
  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center" style={{ background: 'linear-gradient(to bottom right, #f5f9f3, #e8f3e5, #f0f5ee)' }}>
      <div className="text-center">
        <div className="text-2xl font-bold" style={{ color: '#172f0b' }}>로딩 중...</div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
  
// 로그인 화면
  if (!isLoggedIn) {
    return (
      <div className="app-bg" 
        style={{ 
        width: "100vw",
        height: "100vh",
        display: "flex",
        flexDirection: "column",
        alignItems: "center",
        justifyContent: "flex-start",
        paddingTop: "50px",
        background: "linear-gradient(128deg, #f5f9f3, #e8f3e5, #f0f5ee)"
      }}
    >        
      <style>{`
          @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Gamja+Flower&display=swap');
        `}</style>
        <div className="w-full max-w-sm">
        <div className="text-center mb-8">
        <div className="flex justify-center mb-0">
          <img 
            src="data:image/png;base64," 
            alt="Mine Voca Logo" 
            className="w-32 h-32 object-contain"
          />
        </div>
        <h1 className="text-6xl mb-4" style={{ fontFamily: "'Gamja Flower', cursive", fontWeight: 700 }}>
          <span style={{ letterSpacing: '-0.05em', marginRight: '0.1em', background: 'linear-gradient(to right, #172f0b, #2d5a1a)', WebkitBackgroundClip: 'text', WebkitTextFillColor: 'transparent', fontSize: '4rem', backgroundClip: 'text' }}>MINE</span>
          <span style={{ opacity: 0.75, letterSpacing: '-0.05em', paddingRight: '0.15em', background: 'linear-gradient(to right, #172f0b, #2d5a1a)', WebkitBackgroundClip: 'text', WebkitTextFillColor: 'transparent', fontSize: '3.8rem', color: 'transparent' }}>VOCA</span>
        </h1>
          </div>
          <div className="bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-xl p-6">
            <div className="flex items-center justify-center gap-3 mb-4">
              <button 
                onClick={() => {
                  setAuthView('login');
                  setAuthError('');
                }}
                className={`font-bold text-lg ${authView === 'login' ? 'text-gray-700' : 'text-gray-400'}`}
              >
                로그인
              </button>
              <span className="text-gray-300">|</span>
              <button
                onClick={() => {
                  setAuthView('signup');
                  setAuthError('');
                }}
                className={`text-sm ${authView === 'signup' ? 'text-gray-700 font-bold' : 'text-gray-400'}`}
              >
                회원가입
              </button>
            </div>

            {authError && (
              <div className="mb-3 p-2.5 bg-red-50 border border-red-200 rounded-xl text-red-600 text-xs">
                {authError}
              </div>
            )}

            {authView === 'login' ? (
              <div className="space-y-3">
                <div>
                  <label className="block text-xs font-bold text-gray-600 mb-1.5">이메일</label>
                  <input
                    type="email"
                    value={loginForm.email}
                    onChange={(e) => setLoginForm({ ...loginForm, email: e.target.value })}
                    onKeyPress={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && handleLogin()}
                    placeholder="example@email.com"
                    className="w-full px-3 py-2 text-sm border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:border-green-400 transition-all"
                  />
                </div>
                <div>
                  <label className="block text-xs font-bold text-gray-600 mb-1.5">비밀번호 (6자리 숫자)</label>
                  <input
                    type="password"
                    maxLength={6}
                    value={loginForm.password}
                    onChange={(e) => setLoginForm({ ...loginForm, password: e.target.value.replace(/\D/g, '') })}
                    onKeyPress={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && handleLogin()}
                    placeholder="123456"
                    className="w-full px-3 py-2 text-sm border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:border-green-400 transition-all"
                  />
                </div>
                <button
                  onClick={handleLogin}
                  className="w-full text-white py-2.5 rounded-xl font-bold text-sm hover:shadow-lg transition-all"
                  style={{ background: 'linear-gradient(to right, #172f0b, #2d5a1a)' }}
                >
                  단어 다 내꺼🔥
                </button>
              </div>
            ) : (
              <div className="space-y-3">
                <div>
                  <label className="block text-xs font-bold text-gray-600 mb-1.5">이메일</label>
                  <input
                    type="email"
                    value={signupForm.email}
                    onChange={(e) => setSignupForm({ ...signupForm, email: e.target.value })}
                    placeholder="example@email.com"
                    className="w-full px-3 py-2 text-sm border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:border-green-400 transition-all"
                  />
                </div>
                <div>
                  <label className="block text-xs font-bold text-gray-600 mb-1.5">이름</label>
                  <input
                    type="text"
                    value={signupForm.name}
                    onChange={(e) => setSignupForm({ ...signupForm, name: e.target.value })}
                    placeholder="홍길동"
                    className="w-full px-3 py-2 text-sm border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:border-green-400 transition-all"
                  />
                </div>
                <div>
                  <label className="block text-xs font-bold text-gray-600 mb-1.5">비밀번호 (6자리 숫자)</label>
                  <input
                    type="password"
                    maxLength={6}
                    value={signupForm.password}
                    onChange={(e) => setSignupForm({ ...signupForm, password: e.target.value.replace(/\D/g, '') })}
                    placeholder="123456"
                    className="w-full px-3 py-2 text-sm border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:border-green-400 transition-all"
                  />
                </div>
                <div>
                  <label className="block text-xs font-bold text-gray-600 mb-1.5">비밀번호 확인</label>
                  <input
                    type="password"
                    maxLength={6}
                    value={signupForm.confirmPassword}
                    onChange={(e) => setSignupForm({ ...signupForm, confirmPassword: e.target.value.replace(/\D/g, '') })}
                    onKeyPress={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && handleSignup()}
                    placeholder="123456"
                    className="w-full px-3 py-2 text-sm border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:border-green-400 transition-all"
                  />
                </div>
                <button
                  onClick={handleSignup}
                  className="w-full text-white py-2.5 rounded-xl font-bold text-sm hover:shadow-lg transition-all"
                  style={{ background: 'linear-gradient(to right, #172f0b, #2d5a1a)' }}
                >
                  단어 다 내꺼🔥
                </button>
              </div>
            )}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  // 단어장 선택 화면
  if (currentView === 'books') {
    return (
      <div className="min-h-screen p-4" style={{ background: 'linear-gradient(to bottom right, #f5f9f3, #e8f3e5, #f0f5ee)' }}>
        <style>{`
          @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Gamja+Flower&display=swap');
        `}</style>
        <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto">
          {/* 헤더 */}
          <div className="bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg p-6 mb-6">
            <div className="flex items-center justify-between mb-4">
              <div>
                <h1 className="text-5xl mb-2" style={{ fontFamily: "'Gamja Flower', cursive", fontWeight: 700 }}>
                  <span style={{ letterSpacing: '-0.05em', marginRight: '0.1em', background: 'linear-gradient(to right, #172f0b, #2d5a1a)', WebkitBackgroundClip: 'text', WebkitTextFillColor: 'transparent', backgroundClip: 'text' }}>MINE</span>
                  <span style={{ opacity: 0.75, letterSpacing: '-0.05em', background: 'linear-gradient(to right, #172f0b, #2d5a1a)', WebkitBackgroundClip: 'text', WebkitTextFillColor: 'transparent', backgroundClip: 'text' }}>VOCA</span>
                </h1>
                <p className="text-gray-600">{currentUser?.name}님의 단어장</p>
              </div>
              <button
                onClick={handleLogout}
                className="px-4 py-2 text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-800 font-semibold"
              >
                로그아웃
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>

          {/* 단어장 목록 */}
          <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4 mb-6">
            {books.map(book => (
              <div
                key={book.id}
                className="bg-white rounded-xl shadow-lg p-6 hover:shadow-xl transition-all cursor-pointer"
                onClick={() => selectBook(book)}
              >
                <div className="flex items-start justify-between mb-4">
                  <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
                    <Book className="w-8 h-8" style={{ color: '#172f0b' }} />
                    <div>
                      <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-800">{book.name}</h3>
                      <p className="text-gray-500 text-sm">{book.wordCount}개의 단어</p>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <button
                    onClick={(e) => {
                      e.stopPropagation();
                      deleteBook(book.id);
                    }}
                    className="text-gray-400 hover:text-red-500 transition-all"
                  >
                    <Trash2 className="w-5 h-5" />
                  </button>
                </div>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>

          {/* 단어장 추가 */}
          {!showBookInput ? (
            <button
              onClick={() => setShowBookInput(true)}
              className="w-full bg-white rounded-xl shadow-lg p-6 text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 hover:shadow-xl transition-all flex items-center justify-center gap-2"
            >
              <Plus className="w-6 h-6" />
              새 단어장 추가
            </button>
          ) : (
            <div className="bg-white rounded-xl shadow-lg p-6">
              <input
                type="text"
                value={newBookName}
                onChange={(e) => setNewBookName(e.target.value)}
                onKeyPress={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && addBook()}
                placeholder="단어장 이름"
                className="w-full px-4 py-3 border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:border-green-500 mb-3"
                autoFocus
              />
              <div className="flex gap-2">
                <button
                  onClick={addBook}
                  className="flex-1 text-white py-3 rounded-lg font-bold"
                  style={{ background: 'linear-gradient(to right, #172f0b, #2d5a1a)' }}
                >
                  추가
                </button>
                <button
                  onClick={() => {
                    setShowBookInput(false);
                    setNewBookName('');
                  }}
                  className="flex-1 bg-gray-200 text-gray-700 py-3 rounded-lg font-bold"
                >
                  취소
                </button>
              </div>
            </div>
          )}
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  // 단어 목록 화면
  if (currentView === 'list') {
    return (
      <div className="min-h-screen p-4" style={{ background: 'linear-gradient(to bottom right, #f5f9f3, #e8f3e5, #f0f5ee)' }}>
        <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto">
          {/* 헤더 */}
          <div className="bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg p-6 mb-6">
            <div className="flex items-center justify-between mb-4">
              <div className="flex items-center gap-4">
                <button
                  onClick={() => setCurrentView('books')}
                  className="text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-800"
                >
                  ← 단어장 목록
                </button>
                <div>
                  <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-800">{selectedBook?.name}</h2>
                  <p className="text-gray-500">{currentBookWords.length}개의 단어</p>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>

            {/* 학습 메뉴 */}
            <div className="grid grid-cols-2 gap-3">
              <button
                onClick={() => {
                  if (currentBookWords.length > 0) {
                    setCurrentCardIndex(0);
                    setShowAnswer(false);
                    setCurrentView('flashcard');
                  }
                }}
                disabled={currentBookWords.length === 0}
                className="py-4 rounded-lg font-bold text-white hover:shadow-lg transition-all disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed flex items-center justify-center gap-2"
                style={{ background: 'linear-gradient(to right, #172f0b, #2d5a1a)' }}
              >
                <Brain className="w-5 h-5" />
                플래시카드
              </button>
              <button
                onClick={() => {
                  if (currentBookWords.length > 0) {
                    setCurrentCardIndex(0);
                    setQuizAnswer('');
                    setQuizResult(null);
                    setScore({ correct: 0, total: 0 });
                    setCurrentView('quiz');
                  }
                }}
                disabled={currentBookWords.length === 0}
                className="py-4 rounded-lg font-bold text-white hover:shadow-lg transition-all disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed flex items-center justify-center gap-2"
                style={{ background: 'linear-gradient(to right, #172f0b, #2d5a1a)' }}
              >
                <GraduationCap className="w-5 h-5" />
                퀴즈
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>

          {/* 단어 추가 */}
          <div className="bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg p-6 mb-6">
            <h3 className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-800 mb-4">새 단어 추가</h3>
            <div className="space-y-3">
              <input
                type="text"
                value={newWord.english}
                onChange={(e) => setNewWord({ ...newWord, english: e.target.value })}
                placeholder="영어 단어"
                className="w-full px-3 py-2 text-sm border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:border-green-400 transition-all"
              />
              <input
                type="text"
                value={newWord.korean}
                onChange={(e) => setNewWord({ ...newWord, korean: e.target.value })}
                placeholder="한글 뜻"
                className="w-full px-3 py-2 text-sm border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:border-green-400 transition-all"
              />
              <input
                type="text"
                value={newWord.example}
                onChange={(e) => setNewWord({ ...newWord, example: e.target.value })}
                placeholder="예문 (선택사항)"
                className="w-full px-3 py-2 text-sm border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:border-green-400 transition-all"
              />
              <button
                onClick={addWord}
                className="w-full text-white py-3 rounded-lg font-bold hover:shadow-lg transition-all flex items-center justify-center gap-2"
                style={{ background: 'linear-gradient(to right, #172f0b, #2d5a1a)' }}
              >
                <Plus className="w-5 h-5" />
                단어 추가
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>

          {/* 단어 목록 */}
          <div className="space-y-3">
            {currentBookWords.length === 0 ? (
              <div className="bg-white rounded-xl shadow-lg p-8 text-center text-gray-500">
                단어를 추가해주세요
              </div>
            ) : (
              currentBookWords.map(word => (
                <div
                  key={word.id}
                  className="bg-white rounded-xl shadow-lg p-6 hover:shadow-xl transition-all"
                >
                  {editingWord?.id === word.id ? (
                    <div className="space-y-3">
                      <input
                        type="text"
                        value={editingWord.english}
                        onChange={(e) => setEditingWord({ ...editingWord, english: e.target.value })}
                        className="w-full px-4 py-2 border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:border-green-500"
                      />
                      <input
                        type="text"
                        value={editingWord.korean}
                        onChange={(e) => setEditingWord({ ...editingWord, korean: e.target.value })}
                        className="w-full px-4 py-2 border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:border-green-500"
                      />
                      <input
                        type="text"
                        value={editingWord.example || ''}
                        onChange={(e) => setEditingWord({ ...editingWord, example: e.target.value })}
                        className="w-full px-4 py-2 border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:border-green-500"
                      />
                      <div className="flex gap-2">
                        <button
                          onClick={() => updateWord(word.id, editingWord)}
                          className="flex-1 text-white py-2 rounded-lg font-bold"
                          style={{ background: 'linear-gradient(to right, #172f0b, #2d5a1a)' }}
                        >
                          저장
                        </button>
                        <button
                          onClick={() => setEditingWord(null)}
                          className="flex-1 bg-gray-200 text-gray-700 py-2 rounded-lg font-bold"
                        >
                          취소
                        </button>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  ) : (
                    <div className="flex items-start justify-between">
                      <div className="flex-1">
                        <div className="flex items-center gap-3 mb-2">
                          <h4 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-800">{word.english}</h4>
                          <button
                            onClick={() => speakWord(word.english)}
                            className="p-1 hover:bg-gray-100 rounded-full transition-all"
                          >
                            <Volume2 className="w-4 h-4 text-gray-600" />
                          </button>
                        </div>
                        <p className="text-gray-600 mb-1">{word.korean}</p>
                        {word.example && (
                          <p className="text-sm text-gray-500 italic">예: {word.example}</p>
                        )}
                        {word.mastered && (
                          <span className="inline-block mt-2 px-3 py-1 bg-green-100 text-green-700 text-xs font-bold rounded-full">
                            ✓ 암기완료
                          </span>
                        )}
                      </div>
                      <div className="flex gap-2">
                        <button
                          onClick={() => setEditingWord(word)}
                          className="p-2 text-gray-400 hover:text-blue-500 transition-all"
                        >
                          <Edit2 className="w-5 h-5" />
                        </button>
                        <button
                          onClick={() => deleteWord(word.id)}
                          className="p-2 text-gray-400 hover:text-red-500 transition-all"
                        >
                          <Trash2 className="w-5 h-5" />
                        </button>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  )}
                </div>
              ))
            )}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  // 플래시카드 화면
  if (currentView === 'flashcard') {
    if (currentBookWords.length === 0) {
      return (
        <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center p-4" style={{ background: 'linear-gradient(to bottom right, #f5f9f3, #e8f3e5, #f0f5ee)' }}>
          <div className="text-center">
            <p className="text-gray-600 mb-4">단어를 먼저 추가해주세요</p>
            <button
              onClick={() => setCurrentView('list')}
              className="text-white px-6 py-3 rounded-lg"
              style={{ background: '#172f0b' }}
            >
              돌아가기
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>
      );
    }

    const currentWord = currentBookWords[currentCardIndex];

    return (
      <div className="min-h-screen p-4 flex flex-col" style={{ background: 'linear-gradient(to bottom right, #f5f9f3, #e8f3e5, #f0f5ee)' }}>
        <div className="max-w-2xl mx-auto w-full flex-1 flex flex-col">
          <div className="flex items-center justify-between mb-6">
            <button
              onClick={() => setCurrentView('list')}
              className="text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-800 font-semibold"
            >
              ← 목록으로
            </button>
            <div className="text-gray-600 font-semibold">
              {currentCardIndex + 1} / {currentBookWords.length}
            </div>
          </div>

          <div className="flex-1 flex items-center justify-center mb-6">
            <div
              onClick={() => setShowAnswer(!showAnswer)}
              className="w-full max-w-lg cursor-pointer"
            >
              <div className="bg-white rounded-3xl shadow-2xl p-12 text-center transform transition-all hover:scale-105">
                <div className="text-sm text-gray-500 mb-4">
                  {showAnswer ? '한글 뜻' : '영어 단어'}
                </div>
                <div className="flex items-center justify-center gap-3 mb-4">
                  <div className="text-4xl font-bold text-gray-800">
                    {showAnswer ? currentWord.korean : currentWord.english}
                  </div>
                  {!showAnswer && (
                    <button
                      onClick={(e) => {
                        e.stopPropagation();
                        speakWord(currentWord.english);
                      }}
                      className="p-2 hover:bg-gray-100 rounded-full transition-all"
                    >
                      <Volume2 className="w-6 h-6 text-gray-600" />
                    </button>
                  )}
                </div>
                {showAnswer && currentWord.example && (
                  <div className="text-sm text-gray-600 italic mb-4">예: {currentWord.example}</div>
                )}
                <div className="text-sm" style={{ color: '#172f0b' }}>
                  {showAnswer ? '카드를 눌러 영어로' : '카드를 눌러 뜻 보기'}
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>

          <div className="flex gap-4 justify-center mb-6">
            <button
              onClick={prevCard}
              className="bg-white text-gray-700 px-8 py-4 rounded-xl shadow-lg font-semibold hover:shadow-xl transition-all"
            >
              ← 이전
            </button>
            <button
              onClick={() => toggleMastered(currentWord.id)}
              className="px-8 py-4 rounded-xl shadow-lg font-semibold hover:shadow-xl transition-all text-white"
              style={{ background: currentWord.mastered ? '#172f0b' : '#e0e0e0', color: currentWord.mastered ? 'white' : '#666' }}
            >
              {currentWord.mastered ? '✓ 암기완료' : '암기하기'}
            </button>
            <button
              onClick={nextCard}
              className="bg-white text-gray-700 px-8 py-4 rounded-xl shadow-lg font-semibold hover:shadow-xl transition-all"
            >
              다음 →
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  // 퀴즈 화면
  if (currentView === 'quiz') {
    if (currentBookWords.length === 0) {
      return (
        <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center p-4" style={{ background: 'linear-gradient(to bottom right, #f5f9f3, #e8f3e5, #f0f5ee)' }}>
          <div className="text-center">
            <p className="text-gray-600 mb-4">단어를 먼저 추가해주세요</p>
            <button
              onClick={() => setCurrentView('list')}
              className="text-white px-6 py-3 rounded-lg"
              style={{ background: '#172f0b' }}
            >
              돌아가기
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>
      );
    }

    const currentWord = currentBookWords[currentCardIndex];

    return (
      <div className="min-h-screen p-4" style={{ background: 'linear-gradient(to bottom right, #f5f9f3, #e8f3e5, #f0f5ee)' }}>
        <div className="max-w-2xl mx-auto">
          <div className="flex items-center justify-between mb-6">
            <button
              onClick={() => setCurrentView('list')}
              className="text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-800 font-semibold"
            >
              ← 목록으로
            </button>
            <div className="bg-white rounded-full px-6 py-2 shadow-lg">
              <span className="font-bold" style={{ color: '#172f0b' }}>{score.correct}</span>
              <span className="text-gray-400 mx-2">/</span>
              <span className="text-gray-600 font-bold">{score.total}</span>
            </div>
          </div>

          <div className="bg-white rounded-3xl shadow-2xl p-8 mb-6">
            <div className="text-center mb-8">
              <div className="text-sm text-gray-500 mb-4">다음 단어의 뜻을 입력하세요</div>
              <div className="flex items-center justify-center gap-3 mb-8">
                <div className="text-5xl font-bold text-gray-800">
                  {currentWord.english}
                </div>
                <button
                  onClick={() => speakWord(currentWord.english)}
                  className="p-2 hover:bg-gray-100 rounded-full transition-all"
                >
                  <Volume2 className="w-6 h-6 text-gray-600" />
                </button>
              </div>

              {quizResult === null ? (
                <div>
                  <input
                    type="text"
                    value={quizAnswer}
                    onChange={(e) => setQuizAnswer(e.target.value)}
                    onKeyPress={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && checkAnswer()}
                    placeholder="한글 뜻을 입력하세요"
                    className="w-full px-6 py-4 text-xl border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:border-green-500 mb-4"
                    autoFocus
                  />
                  <button
                    onClick={checkAnswer}
                    disabled={!quizAnswer.trim()}
                    className="w-full text-white py-4 rounded-xl font-bold text-lg hover:shadow-lg transition-all disabled:opacity-50"
                    style={{ background: 'linear-gradient(to right, #172f0b, #2d5a1a)' }}
                  >
                    정답 확인
                  </button>
                </div>
              ) : (
                <div>
                  <div className={`text-2xl font-bold mb-4 ${quizResult ? 'text-green-600' : 'text-red-600'}`}>
                    {quizResult ? (
                      <div className="flex items-center justify-center gap-2">
                        <Check className="w-8 h-8" />
                        정답입니다! 🎉
                      </div>
                    ) : (
                      <div>
                        <div className="flex items-center justify-center gap-2 mb-2">
                          <X className="w-8 h-8" />
                          틀렸습니다
                        </div>
                        <div className="text-lg text-gray-600">
                          정답: <span style={{ color: '#172f0b' }}>{currentWord.korean}</span>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    )}
                  </div>
                  <button
                    onClick={nextQuiz}
                    className="w-full text-white py-4 rounded-xl font-bold text-lg hover:shadow-lg transition-all"
                    style={{ background: 'linear-gradient(to right, #172f0b, #2d5a1a)' }}
                  >
                    다음 문제 →
                  </button>
                </div>
              )}
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }
}
